channel.title: How do edit npcs and objects on my source
channel.description:
ok i try to edit npc and objects and other things but i cant figure out how other servers do it i saw a genie with a fishbowl helmet and aparatus and i saw a lumbridge guide sitting in a new chari from construction.can you give me a program or a way to do this
thanks
~~~~~~~~~~~blitz_9100~~~~~~~~~~
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 08:39:51 PM[/size][hr]noone knows how to edit npcs visualy
